meaningMnemonic: You put your <radical>fingers</radical> in the <radical>coffin</radical> to tickle the <radical>beggar</radical> inside. What you're doing is a new form of <kanji>torture</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: The beggar you will coffin tickle <kanji>torture</kanji> is none other than old Grandpa <reading>ごう</reading>いち. He is a frail old man, and doesn't like to be tickled.
